author: mseidel42
body: #### PR description: * This PR adds TDC timing simulation for the HF --> enables the use of data noise filters in MC * Presentation in HCAL DPG: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1026044/contributions/4324030/attachments/2227968/3774461/qie10tdc_mseidel.pdf * Pulse shape deemed sufficient (no update) * Eta-dependence comes from PCaloHits in the HF shower library, will be fixed separately #### PR validation: MC [unit: TDC = ns/2] vs data [ns] comparison:
title: TDC simulation for QIE10 (HF)
